channel.title: Where's the PerfectScape I have been waiting for?
channel.description:
A RuneScape exactly like Jagex's RuneScape except
no swear words bleeped, no power hungry mods, no getting banned for something like autoing....
and everything else would be there, free updates to RuneScape, and members for free.
Is there a private server like that? If there is, please tell me. Or at least a server closed to that. Ihave used at least 5 or 6 servers so far, and about 20 others which are never online. And all of those servers suck, they are extremely buggy, most people there are about 6 people, and it just overall sucks.
I heard some talk about WhiteScape (sounds like something the kkk rs version to me), does anyone know if that is a good server, and if you do, could you give me the registrating link and IP. Thank you so much.
:confused: :(

item.title: Where's the PerfectScape I have been waiting for?

item.title: Where's the PerfectScape I have been waiting for?
item.dc:creator: @Trigun Trigun
item.description:
@Trigun wrote:

Why bother asking? If that was the case, don’t you think you’d be able to find it pretty fast? And bedsides, if it’s that close, just play Real RS! I mean, no point to put all that effort into a server to be just like the original…

Read full topic
item.source: Where's the PerfectScape I have been waiting for?

item.title: Where's the PerfectScape I have been waiting for?
item.dc:creator: @masonw masonw
item.description:
@masonw wrote:

No, there are no servers exactly like Jagex. (Well of course, they are profesionals, have full development tools, alot of people working on one game, people to come up with ideas, people to code them… and more… Most of us are editing in textpad and have 1 person to add everything.)

Read full topic
item.source: Where's the PerfectScape I have been waiting for?
